column4: I got a headless server running Ubuntu 10.04 and use xvnc to create a display to login to the server (using vncviewer). Now, when i plugin a usb stick, it says it is unable to mount it (no permission). I have Googled the problem, but did not came up with a solution, busting my head what I am doing wrong. Anyone has a solution?
I login to it using vncviewer and plugin a disk into my server. Then it gives an error that it is unable to mount (no permission)
not sure how mout is related to vncsession, but normally only root can do that
